title: Set up database
close_reason: Database module implemented with full schema, CRUD for jobs and profile tables, and passing smoke test

title: Data Pipeline
description: Unified fetch, cross-source deduplication, SQLite job store, and daily scheduler.
close_reason: Data Pipeline epic complete - unified pipeline, database schema, deduplication, and daily scheduler all working

title: Unified pipeline entry point
description: Single run_pipeline.py that calls RSS fetch and web search, then stores results.

title: Cross-source deduplication
description: Deduplicate jobs by URL across RSS and web search sources before storing.
close_reason: Deduplication handled automatically by database - URL is unique key, upsert_job() merges duplicates across sources

title: SQLite job store schema
description: Design and create jobs table: title, url, description, source, posted_date, score, status, created_at.
close_reason: Schema already implemented in db/schema.py - jobs table with all required fields plus resume/cover letter fields

title: Migrate existing CSVs to SQLite
description: One-time import of jobs/*.csv files into the SQLite job store.
close_reason: CSVs cleaned, migrated to SQLite, and filtered to Seattle metro + remote + US-wide jobs (72 remaining)

title: Daily scheduler via launchd
description: macOS launchd plist to run the pipeline daily and log output.
close_reason: Implemented launchd scheduler - runs daily at 8am, logs to logs/, tested and working

title: Profile Backend
description: SQLite schema for job history, education, certificates, and skills taxonomy. Foundation for scoring, resume, and cover letter generation.

title: Profile SQLite schema
description: Tables: job_history (company, title, start/end dates, description), education, certificates, skills (name, category, proficiency).

title: Skills taxonomy
description: Define skill categories: writing, API/dev tools, AI/ML, content strategy, taxonomy/IA, tools. Used for resume tailoring and scoring.

title: Profile data entry
description: CLI script or Flask form to populate the profile DB with job history, education, certs, and skills.

title: Scoring and Filtering
description: LLM-based relevance scoring of job listings against profile skills. Score stored per job in SQLite.

title: LLM relevance scorer
description: Given a job description and profile skills, use an LLM to produce a relevance score (0-10) with brief rationale.

title: Integrate scorer into pipeline
description: Run scorer on all newly fetched jobs and store score in SQLite jobs table.

title: Filter and sort by score in job list
description: UI and query support for filtering jobs by minimum score and sorting by score descending.

title: Job Tracking
description: Status workflow: new → reviewed → applied → rejected / offer. Managed via UI and stored in SQLite.

title: Job status column in SQLite
description: Add status field to jobs table with values: new, reviewed, applied, rejected, offer.

title: Status update endpoint
description: Flask route to update a job's status. Called from job list and detail views.

title: Bulk status update
description: Mark multiple jobs at once (e.g., mark all low-score jobs as rejected).

title: Resume and Cover Letter
description: LLM-tailored resume per job from profile. Edit in markdown, convert to PDF with pandoc. Draft cover letter generator.

title: Resume markdown template
description: Base resume template in markdown. Sections: summary, experience, skills, education, certifications.

title: LLM resume tailoring
description: Given profile + job description, use LLM to select and emphasize relevant experience and skills into a tailored markdown resume.

title: Markdown to PDF conversion
description: Pandoc-based conversion of resume markdown to PDF. Triggered from UI when applying.

title: Cover letter generator
description: LLM generates a draft cover letter from profile + job description. Saved as markdown per job.

title: Per-job resume and cover letter storage
description: Store generated resume and cover letter markdown per job in a dedicated directory or SQLite blob.

title: Notifications
description: Daily digest of new high-score jobs via email or macOS desktop notification.

title: Daily digest script
description: Query SQLite for new high-score jobs from the last 24 hours and format as a digest.

title: macOS notification or email delivery
description: Send daily digest via macOS osascript notification or SMTP email.

title: Web App
description: Flask web app: job list with filtering, job detail, status updates, resume/cover letter generation trigger, markdown editor.

title: Flask app project structure
description: Set up Flask app with blueprints, templates/, static/, and config. Single app.py entry point.

title: Job list view
description: Main page: paginated job list with filter by status/score/source/date and sort controls.

title: Job detail view
description: Detail page: full job description, score rationale, status selector, links to resume/cover letter.

title: Resume and cover letter generation UI
description: Buttons on job detail to trigger LLM resume tailoring and cover letter generation.

title: Markdown editor for resume
description: In-browser markdown editor (e.g. CodeMirror or textarea + preview) to edit generated resume before PDF export.

title: PDF export from UI
description: Button to convert current resume markdown to PDF via pandoc and download it.

title: Review and reduce redundant Python code
